career.name: College Hackathon Organizer
career.title: Event Head (Intra-College Hackathon & Quiz)
description: Organized and mentored participants in a college-wide Hackathon for BCA students
Led the UI/UX design concept integrating modern scrolling libraries and traditional Indian aesthetics
Managed coordination between departments (BCA, BBA, BHM) to reflect their fields in the design and experience
